duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage technical projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget, using Scrum and agile methodologies.
Lead a cross-functional team of developers, engineers, and other stakeholders to achieve project objectives.
Apply technical expertise in Java and Microservices to guide and support the development team in delivering high-quality solutions.
Implement and maintain project management processes, including risk management, resource allocation, and project documentation.
Communicate project status, issues, and risks to stakeholders and provide timely solutions to ensure project success.
Ensure that technical projects align with business objectives and contribute to the overall success of the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
